name: Trip
short_description: Self-hostable map tracker and trip planner to visualize POIs and organize your next adventure.
description: Self-hostable map tracker and trip planner to visualize POIs and organize your next adventure. Trip is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, tools, indexer, servarr. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Trip on your home server to self-hostable map tracker and trip planner to visualize pois and organize your next adventure without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Trip to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
